summary: FRONT LEFT SIDE TORSION BAR BROKE WHILE SITTING IN THE GARAGE. DROVE THE VEHICLE THE DAY BEFORE. WIFE GOT INTO VEHICLE ON 6-2-03 AND FRONT END HAD SAGGED ON THE LEFT SIDE. VEHICLE TAKEN TO REPAIR FACILITY AND REPORTED THAT TORSION BAR HAD BROKEN. WHEN A GM DEALER WAS CONTACTED FOR PARTS, IT WAS STRESSED THAT BOTH SIDES BE REPAIRED DUE TO HISTORY OF THIS ISSUE.   *NLM
